remarks: Membership in a restricted class abstraction, using implicit substitution.  This version has bound-variable hypotheses in place of distinct variable restrictions.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Sep-2003.)
statement:
elrabf.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
elrabf.2 $e |- F/_ x B $.
elrabf.3 $e |- F/ x ps $.
elrabf.4 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
elrabf $p |- ( A e. { x e. B | ph } <-> ( A e. B /\ ps ) ) $.
